TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ComposablePartDefinition extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Defines an abstract base class for composable part definitions, which describe and enable the creation of objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart CreatePart() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of a part that the describes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Derived types that override this method should return a new instance of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> object every time that the method is invoked and should never return `null`.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of objects that describe the objects exported by the part defined by this object.
Docs.value: A collection of objects that describe the exported objects provided by objects created by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Overrides of this property should never return `null`. If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> objects created by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> do not provide exported objects, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection instead.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of objects that describe the imports required by the part defined by this object.
Docs.value: A collection of objects that describe the imports required by objects created by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Overrides of this property should never return `null`. If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> objects created by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> do not have imports, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection instead.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of the metadata for this object.
Docs.value: A collection that contains the metadata for the . The default is an empty, read-only <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Overrides of this property should return a read-only <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object with a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparer, such as <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>, and should never return `null`. If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> does not contain metadata, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object instead.
